input:
Alice, Bob, and Claire are playing a game. At the start of the game, they are each holding a ball: Alice has a blue ball, Bob has a black ball, and Claire has a pink ball.
As the game progresses, pairs of players trade balls. First, Claire and Bob swap balls. Then, Bob and Alice swap balls. Finally, Claire and Alice swap balls. At the end of the game, Alice has the
Options:
(A) blue ball
(B) black ball
(C) pink ball
